modName: Remove Annoying Lines - Incl Housecarls and Townsfolk
summary: Makes some of the most annoying, constantly repeated lines just play once, instead of over and over.
descriptionHtml:
Makes some of the most annoying, constantly repeated lines just play once, instead of over and over

Also on Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=63625509

LATEST UPDATE:
* Nazeem\'s condescending cloud district line only plays once
* Braith\'s \"What are you looking at? I\'m not afraid of you\" line only plays once
* Cityguard\'s \"I used to be an adventurer like you. But then I took an arrow in the knee\" only plays once

So far it does the following:

* Changes trade dialogue of all housecarls from \"I am sworn to carry your burden\" to \"What do you want me to carry?\"
* Makes Cityguard\'s \"I used to be an adventurer like you. But then I took an arrow in the knee\" play only once
* Makes Olfina Grey-Mane\'s \"What\'s the matter? You can\'t stand the sight of a strong Nord woman?\" play only once.
* Makes Mila Vilentia\'s \"I work with my mother, to sell fruits and vegetables. It\'s fun most days, but hard work.\" play only once.
* Makes Nazeem\'s condescending cloud district line play only once
* Makes Braith\'s \"What are you looking at? I\'m not afraid of you\" line play only once


Playing with this mod on an existing savegame where you heard those before, they won\'t be repeated. If you start a new game, they will play only once.

Got any other NPC lines that grind your gears? Let me know in the comments, maybe I can include them in an update.

Changelog:
1.0
* Makes Olfina Grey-Mane\'s \"What\'s the matter? You can\'t stand the sight of a strong Nord woman?\" play only once.
* Changes trade dialogue of all housecarls from \"I am sworn to carry your burden\" to \"What do you want me to carry?\"
* Makes Mila Vilentia\'s \"I work with my mother, to sell fruits and vegetables. It\'s fun most days, but hard work.\" play only once.

1.1 
* Nazeem\'s condescending cloud district line only plays once
* Braith\'s \"What are you looking at? I\'m not afraid of you\" line only plays once
author: Annihilator
